markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Call of the Wild](/Feats.aspx?ID=317) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 134 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You call upon the creatures of nature to come to your aid. You can spend 10 minutes in concert with nature to replace one of the spells you’ve prepared in one of your druid spell slots with a [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316) or [_summon plants and fungus_](/Spells.aspx?ID=325) spell of the same level.

<title level="2">Call of the Wild leads to...</title>
[Primal Summons](/Feats.aspx?ID=343)
name: Call of the Wild
